docs.snippet: The president boasted that he was just improvising when he insisted to Prime Minister Justin Trudeau that the U.S. had a trade deficit with Canada.

headline.print_headline: Trump Says He Made Up Deficit Claim in Talk with Trudeau, Baffling Canadians
headline.main: Trump Says He Made Up Deficit Claim in Talk with Trudeau, Baffling Canadians

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump and leader Raul Castro will attend the Summit of the Americas next week in Peru.

headline.print_headline: Trump and Raul Castro Will Attend Summit of the Americas
headline.main: Trump and Raul Castro Will Attend Summit of the Americas

docs.snippet: Beijing is pushing companies to sell more higher-value products, making fights over raw steel and aluminum more about China’s past than the future.

headline.print_headline: Even Before Tariffs, China Shut Some Factories
headline.main: Trump Condemns Chinese Factories. China Is Already Closing Some.

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump will be attending another dinner held by a super PAC.

headline.print_headline: Trump Attending Another Super PAC Dinner
headline.main: Trump Attending Another Super PAC Dinner

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump is remembering the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. on the 50th anniversary of the civil rights leader's assassination.

headline.print_headline: Trump Tweets Video Clip of Remarks in Praise of King
headline.main: Trump Tweets Video Clip of Remarks in Praise of King

docs.snippet: Scores of the president’s nominees are held up in the Senate, but few confirmation drives have turned into a cause as the one for his pick for ambassador to Germany has.

headline.print_headline: Opposing Factions Join to Urge Confirmation of a Gay Presidential Appointee
headline.main: Opposing Factions Join to Push Confirmation of a Gay Trump Appointee

docs.snippet: U.S. President Donald Trump denied on Wednesday that the United States was in a trade war with China, hours after Beijing slapped tariffs on a list of U.S. imports in retaliation for similar duties levied by the White House one day earlier.

headline.print_headline: Trump Says 'We Are Not in a Trade War With China': Tweet
headline.main: Trump Says 'We Are Not in a Trade War With China': Tweet

docs.snippet: Countries mixed appeals to friendship with threats of retaliation. But the lobbying frenzy risked undermining the ground rules of world trade.

headline.print_headline: Threats, Pleas and a Golf Great: Nations’ Tactics for Tariff Relief
headline.main: U.S. Allies Jostle to Win Exemptions From Trump Tariffs

docs.snippet: President Trump is finally following through on the trade crackdowns that terrify Republican leaders in Congress and many economists.

headline.print_headline: Trump Embraces a Trade War, Which Could Undermine Growth
headline.main: Trump Embraces a Trade War, Which Could Undermine Growth

docs.snippet: Seven Twitter users filed suit after they were blocked by President Trump’s account. At a hearing on Thursday, the main topic was the nature of Twitter.

headline.print_headline: Twitter Users Go to Court To Challenge Trump Block
headline.main: Judge Floats Idea to Settle @realDonaldTrump Twitter Blocking Case
